ability.shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
ability.shadowstep.description: Hide in the shadows, making your next strike a critical.^Aether Cost: 15
ability.shapeshift.description: Shapeshift into an animal, providing various benefits.^Aether Cost: 5 + 1 per three seconds
Mateo.RejectBouquet: Did Aideen help you put that bouquet together, @? It looks beautiful.
rogue-skill.name: Artificer
rogue-skill.unlock.1: Adds an armor slot and a bow tool, craftable at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.unlock.2: Purified ore now has a chance of dropping from their respective nodes,^to be used at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.unlock.4: Exquisite gems now have a chance of dropping from their respective nodes,^to be used at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.unlock.6: You can now perform Blade Coating at the Underforge.
rogue-skill.profession.armor-recovery.de: Once an hour, get a chance to recover Armor Points by changing locations.
rogue-skill.profession.rogueish-archetyp: 25% chance of shooting a second arrow without consuming additional ammo.
rogue-skill.profession.flash-of-genius.d: The first craftable you make each day has zero ingredient cost.^(Ingredients must still be owned, however.)
rogue-skill.profession.armor-proficiency: Adds 50% more armor points on top of your total amount.
rogue-skill.profession.shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
rogue-skill.profession.shadowstep.descri: Ability: Shadowstep^Become hidden, reducing most monster aggro until you attack.^Your first attack is a critical.
rogue-skill.profession.hunters-mark.name: Hunter's Mark'
rogue-skill.profession.hunters-mark.desc: Once a creature is attacked, consecutive hits on the same creature do more damage.
anvil.not-enough: You need {{qty}} of that for this effect.
description.coating.(O)769: Basic attacks affect all four cardinal directions. (Invisible)
description.coating.(O)768: Upon killing a mob, they blow up. (No damage to farmer.)
description.coating.(O)767: You can attack across stones and other objects.
keybind.shapeshift.name: Shapeshift Keybind
keybind.shapeshift.description: The key to shapeshift (if unlocked). Long press (2 seconds) to change your form.
item.druidic-essence.name: Druidic Essence
item.druidic-essence.description: Nature's power, manifest. Used to breathe life into new things.'
hector.engagement.wait: You've just started dating! Wait a while.
wallet-item.name: Thorned Circlet Fragment
druidics.name: Druidics
druidics.profession.shapeshifting.name: Skilled Shapeshifter
druidics.profession.shapeshifting.descri: Adds stamina regeneration ability to shapeshifting.
druidics.profession.agriculture.name: Ancient Agronomist
druidics.profession.agriculture.descript: Reduces cost of creating ancient druidic seeds by one essence.
druidics.profession.shapeshifting-stag.d: Adds health regeneration to stamina regeneration with double the speed.
druidics.profession.shapeshifting-wolf.d: Adds ability to fight while shapeshifted. Adds passive defense and attack.
All ancient crops grow 10% faster, and all artisan goods derived from them are worth 10% more. Stacks with Artisan and Agriculturist.
druidics.profession.agriculture-yggdrasi: Druidic essences have an additional 10% chance to spawn. Druidic crops water surrounding crops with the same range as a Quality Sprinkler.
bardics.name: Bardics
bardics.song.buff.name: Fantasia Alla Marcia
bardics.song.buff.description: Grants a random passive buff.^Aether Cost: 20^Usable once per day.
bardics.song.battle.name: Battlefield Overture
bardics.song.battle.description: Grats either an attack or defense buff.^Usable once per day.^Aether Cost: 20
bardics.song.restoration.name: Invigorating Encore
bardics.song.restoration.description: Restores 25% health and energy.^Usable once per day.^Aether Cost: 10
bardics.song.protection.name: Enduring Melody
bardics.song.protection.description: Creates a protective sound barrier that keeps enemies away for 30 seconds.^Aether Cost: 10
bardics.song.npcbuff.name: Rogues' Humorsque
bardics.song.npcbuff.description: Offers a buff depending on who it's played to.^Usable on one villager per day.^Aether Cost: 25
bardics.song.attack.name: Scherzo D'Inganno
bardics.song.attack.description: Lets out a discordant sound that damages all enemies in range.^Aether Cost: 20
bardics.song.time.name: Ballad of Chronomancy
bardics.song.time.description: Pauses time for two minutes.^Aether Cost: 35
bardics.song.horse.name: Track of {{horseName}}
bardics.song.horse.description: Teleports you to your horse.^Aether Cost: 10
bardics.song.crops.name: Druid's Lullaby
bardics.song.crops.description: Once per day, applies +25% growth rate to crops in a 7x7 area around you, once per crop.^Aether Cost: 30
bardics.song.obelisk.name: A Walk in Adante
bardics.song.obelisk.description: Allows remote use of any obelisks you've acquired.^Aether Cost: 15
bardics.profession.npcbuff.strength.name: Animated Performance
bardics.profession.npcbuff.strength.desc: Strength of Bardic buffs are doubled.
bardics.profession.npcbuff.duration.name: Creative Crescendo
bardics.profession.npcbuff.duration.desc: All Bardic buffs last all day.
bardics.profession.attack.strength.name: Words of Terror
bardics.profession.attack.strength.descr: Damage of Scherzo D'Inganno is doubled.
bardics.profession.attack.range.name: Words of Majesty
bardics.profession.attack.range.descript: Range of Scherzo D'Inganno is extended to the entire location.
